projects.name: Chamber of Deputies (Italy)
projects.summary: Developed and deployed an assistive tool for automatic classification of legislative documents from initial conception through production release, now in active use.
highlights: Implemented classification aligned with the EuroVoc thesaurus to ensure standardized categorization.
Tools Used: Python, PyTorch, BERT, LLMs, LangChain, Ollama.

projects.name: LACUNAE
projects.summary: Development of a digital tool that uses artificial intelligence to generate suggestions for the integration of lacunae in Greek and Latin epigraphic documents.
highlights: Application of few-shot learning, transfer learning, fine-tuning and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to overcome data limitations.
Constructed novel datasets (textual and visual) to train and evaluate models.
Tools Used: Python, PyTorch, JAX, LLMS, RAG, DSPY, YOLO, and R.
